title: Effective Learning Strategies Through Web Feed Utilization in E-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage skills and experience accessing e-learning platforms
context.additional_context: Cultivating the ability to utilize web feeds through peer teaching and formative assessment in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can subscribe to professional web feeds and set content filtering criteria using an RSS reader
Learners can evaluate and improve web feed-based learning materials through a peer feedback system
Learners can summarize real-time feed content received in mobile environments using a three-tier summarization framework

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
